problem_text_cn: 如图,某山坡的坡面AB=200米,坡角∠BAC=30°,则该山坡的高BC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the slope AB = N_0 of a certain mountain slope, and the slope angle ∠BAC = N_1, then the height of the mountain slope BC is ()
raw_answer: 解:由题意得,∠BCA=90°,∠BAC=30°,AB=200米,故可得BC$=\frac{1}{2}$AB=100米．故选:B．
